data.message: love your music man been a fan for many years until you decided to shit on us with that fucking anti-trump cypher, shit was wack, we know you can rap better than that, and have better flow EM, i would have appreciated it more regardless of the message if you had thought it through and do what we all know you can do, your freestyles from 20 years ago are so much better than the shit you sprayed, get it together and give us what we know you can do

replies.message: He did have a message. You just chose not to see it.
Did see it just poorly delivered
https://youtu.be/wo_GLkvRSis im just going to leave this right here
